DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence of malnutrition in patients with colorectal cancer is recorded. We want to find out, if a malnourished patient has more complications after the elective surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Malnutrition on Colon Cancer Patients With Abdominal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: All patients attending elective colorectal surgery are screened for malnutrition in advance. Their length of stay in the hospital and the complications are recorded.
DOC.criteria: Colorectal Carcinoma Elective surgery Informed consent Survival < 4 weeks
